text: A former Laguna Beach star is about to become a mother - of - two. Alex Murrel revealed she is pregnant with her second child via Instagram. On Sunday, the MTV alum shared photos that showed her husband, Kyle Mark Johnson, and 1 - year - old son, Levi, with the caption :'Baby brother on his way this July # JulyBabies.'The Laguna Beach star, better known as Alex M. on the hit show, showed off her growing baby bump in a black For Love & Lemons maxi dress with brown and white flowers.
